title: doc: update contribute instructions to work on windows
body:
contribute.html needs update to cover instructions for windows developers.

There are issues as reported at:
https://groups.google.com/forum/?fromgroups=#!topic/golang-nuts/3FajDvxwf04
https://groups.google.com/forum/#!msg/golang-nuts/b--EMAankSE/MrZJP1aFkVQJ
